text: The Portrait () is a 1915 Russian silent horror movie directed by Ladislas Starevich.Ужасы в РоссииВ Самаре выступит эпатажный петербургский поэт Владимир Горохов It stars Andrey Gromov and Ivan Lazarev. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian horror movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1915 movies Category:1910s horror movies
title: The Portrait (1915 movie)
